pages.text: Mostly clear glass made with $(item)Certus Quartz Dust$() or $(item)Nether Quartz Dust$(), seems to have energy conducting properties. Can be used to make $(l:ae2:decorative_blocks/quartz_glass#quartz_vibrant_glass)Vibrant Quartz Glass$(/l).
A variant of $(item)Quartz Glass$() that glows like glowstone.
